categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Primtara incident was an incident on Primtara in Primtara outpost where at least two troopers of the Rebel Alliance were killed. Further investigations by Rebel Alliance Intelligence Service of ballistics, spectrographic analysis, and chemical processes, as well as reports of an Imperial presence on Primtara and the unconfirmed information of a new Imperial unit named SCAR squadron, along with witness accounts, provided strong evidence that it was Task Force 99 who was behind the attack.
